content:
Hi. I would like to maybe take a shoot at implementing HTTP patch support. To track that discussion. I have created https://github.com/ewoutkramer/fhir-net-api/issues/813
I would appreciate any feedback and guidance on the issue, before starting implementation.

Any updates on this, and any tips on existing libs to create a patch? @David Hay
